name: io.github.equilibrium-team/tweekit
title: TweekIT MCP Server
description: Normalize and convert more than 400 file types via TweekIT's hosted MCP streamable HTTP endpoint.

headers.name: ApiKey
headers.description: TweekIT API key issued from the TweekIT account portal.

headers.name: ApiSecret
headers.description: API secret paired with the ApiKey for authenticated conversions.
